ValidationRule.description: Discontinuation of Planning: Death Prior Status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Discontinuation of Planning: Death Prior"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Awaiting Forms")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Follow up required for CC Review/Checks")),OR(NOT(ISPICKVAL(X1632__c,"Yes")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(X1633__c,"Yes")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(X1634__c,"Yes"))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Not all forms have been received (Form 1632, Form 1633, Form 1634), status can only be set to Awaiting Forms or Follow up required for CC Review/Checks
